thread.title: BRIEF-Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Says Su Haitao Removed From Chairman, General Manager Posts

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Says Su Haitao Removed From Chairman, General Manager Posts

organizations.name: brief-hubei yichang transportation group says su haitao removed from
reuters) - hubei yichang transportation group co ltd

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS SU HAITAO REMOVED FROM CHAIRMAN, GENERAL MANAGER POSTS DUE TO CHANGE IN JOB ROLES Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2mIwC2I Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
